title: Blackjack
summary: Blackjack (formerly Black Jack and Vingt-Un) is a casino banking game.[1]: 342  The most widely played casino banking game in the world, it uses decks of 52 cards and descends from a global family of casino banking games known as Twenty-One. This family of card games also includes the British game of Pontoon and the European game, Vingt-et-Un.[2] Blackjack players do not compete against each other. The game is a comparing card game where each player competes against the dealer.
